Posts.Content: Dear Fiona Go as your gut feeling tells you if you dont feel that the exploratory procedures you had may not be accurate --I can see why on the history of your close family why you should be anxious --I had a very good consultant where I was and felt I could trust him -Life always has uncertainties to cope with and I lay in bed at night and think of WHAT IFS --not so much about my illness which was 5 years ago now but family and other worries --whether it is a 40 something female Â hangup or what I dont know --keep in touch Ellen Hope
Posts.Title: Found a lump.....maybe need second opinion????
